issue.name: TCheckBox.Alignment
issue.short: CheckBox Alignment property is not supported
issue.descr: Use BiDiMode = bdRightToLeft as a workaround

issue.name: TRadioButton.Alignment
issue.short: RadioButton Alignment property is not supported
issue.descr: Use BiDiMode = bdRightToLeft as a workaround

issue.name: TPageControl.TabHeight
issue.short: Changing of default tab height is not supported

issue.name: TPageControl.TabWidth
issue.short: Changing of default tab width is not supported

issue.name: TTabControl.TabHeight
issue.short: Changing of default tab height is not supported

issue.name: TTabControl.TabWidth
issue.short: Changing of default tab width is not supported
